item.title: Broken beer bottles and cans, 3rd December
item.description:
Yet again more beer cans and broken bottles on the junction of Cornwall Avenue and Bedford Avenue outside the school. More scattered in the hedges up Cornwall Avenue and dump on the corner of Somerset Ave and Bedford Ave. More outside the shops at Rowanfield along with fast food containers.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Bedford Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Damaged grass verges, 2nd December
item.description:
Outside No.2 Cowley Close, Benhall, Cheltenham GL51 6NP the company doing some garden work called Rudmans, have churned up the grass verges. They must be held to account if they don't reinstate them to original state
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Cowley Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud on road, 2nd December
item.description:
Outside the site of new houses by Linden Homes builder is a huge amount of mud deposited on the road by themselves and their contractors. In places it is inches deep and cannot be avoided by cyclists, motor cyclists and cars. No attempt has been made by what can only be suggested, an anti-social and couldn't care less builder, to clean away the mud. It makes the road unsafe and will double, if not treble braking distances on this winding road. Linden Homes, a national builder, could clean the road or have a wheel wash on site. But doesn't appear to bother. It will only get worse as winter proceeds.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Homelands Farm Cottage Gotherington Lane, Gotherington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud on the road, 2nd December
item.description:
Outside the site of new houses by Bell the builder is a huge amount of mud on the road. So much in fact that some of it has been carried to the Cleeve Road. No attempt has been made by what can be suggested, an anti-social and couldn't care less builder, to clean up the mud. It makes the road unsafe and will double, if not treble braking distances. Bell could clean the road or have a wheel wash on site.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Privet Court Gretton Road, Gotherington
Report on FixMyStreet
